DrifterMod:Sixty.NAME: 60 Degree Turn
DrifterMod:Sixty.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Drift !M! NL Next turn, gain !M! Dexterity for one turn.

DrifterMod:Brake.NAME: Brake
DrifterMod:Brake.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Deal !D! damage and gain 1 Draw-down next turn for each card discarded. NL (Deals !M! damage.)

DrifterMod:HairPin.NAME: Hairpin Turn
DrifterMod:HairPin.DESCRIPTION: If you have no Drift, deal !D! damage and Drift !M!

DrifterMod:SpinOut.NAME: Spin Out
DrifterMod:SpinOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns for each Drift for one turn. NL Lose your Drift. NL Gain 1 Draw-down next turn for each Drift.

DrifterMod:Ninety.NAME: 90 Degree Turn
DrifterMod:Ninety.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Drift !M! NL Gain !M! Strength while Drifting.

DrifterMod:BigCrash.NAME: Hyper Crash
DrifterMod:BigCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage (Equal to Max HP/20 * Cards in hand) NL Lose your Drift and do not draw next turn.

DrifterMod:EngineRev.NAME: Engine Rev
DrifterMod:EngineRev.DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Overdraw !M! cards and gain !M! [E] next turn. NL Exhaust.

DrifterMod:Coast.NAME: Coast
DrifterMod:Coast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain !M! cards this turn.

DrifterMod:HardPass.NAME: Hard Pass
DrifterMod:HardPass.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Overdraw !M! next turn.

DrifterMod:Tmph.NAME: Speed-up
DrifterMod:Tmph.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards to deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Ethereal

DrifterMod:InertialDrift.NAME: Inertial Drift
DrifterMod:InertialDrift.DESCRIPTION: Gain block and deal damage to all enemies equal to your Drift. NL Double your Drift. NL Exhaust
